body: Did the author get inspired by Junji Ito or something? Damn, i just want the MC to start a bloodline genocide after that.

Close call, I almost didn't see the ntr tag and nearly read this, I hate when that happens.

This story is well written. The character development, the main plot, the surrounding environtment. Everything almost perfect. Almost!! Except for one small flaws. If only the brother refuse to have his way with her sister. It shows the consitency of his ideal to begin with.

This is a well done plot for a dark and cursed story. I don't like NTR, but this one's plot and its elements like the characters and the background environments are very organized and compelling to read.
8/10

"Gentlemen, please have a seat. Today we will share our thoughts about this piece of fine art. The story, the characters, and the world building. Truly outstanding isn't it? The ammount of pages it self was spot on. Not too long, not too short. Yes, sir. You may talk."

I'm not feeling sad after reading this, maybe becouse it was his sister, but the story was great! Enjoyable but not in the good way, satysfying in a sense of reading a good plot with decent characters.

Remember a story akin to this which had a similiar setting where the dead father haunted their ancestral villa and tempted in girls around there in a cave where they were violated.The son who ran away was called back in and through trials took his father's role.Though at the end he could break away the curse and set the girls free

Damn, remember when artists used to make original NTR like this one? Whatever happened to that? The humiliation of the protagonist isn't very heavy, but the story itself is completely fucked up. Even though the MC can't change the fact that Konatsu will never be his (nor will her firstborn), It's still nice to see him going apeshit instead of remaining oblivious until the end or just dying in a pool of tears, sweat and cum. Also, thanks Drmono for the amazing info. The thing about the Jizo statues only made this manga even more fucked up. This has to be one of the best eromanga I've ever read and I'll probably remember it for years.
What happened to this artist? Made something like this and just, gone?

Ok since not many get this. You see those ALL THOSE EFFING STATUES? well, those are Jizo statues. Jizo is the god of travelers,Children and Maternity. We will center in the "Children and Maternity" part. Jizo statues and offerings are for two main reasons. Celebrate the recovery of a kid from an illness or accident, or to mourn the death of a kid/stillborn.
So yeah, that family has had a lot of miscarriages and the Imouto has had AT LEAST one.
Those are probably mummified babies from spontaneous abortions due to miscarriages either from careless sex during the unstable phase or inbred defects

+definitionofinsanity Aloha Snackbar? Are you implying he could have made a bomb to blow them all up? 

Couple of problems. One, explosions would kill the victims. Two, making a bomb is not as simple as looking up a 101, especially one that actually will damage people. The columbine killers planned making bombs and shit for MONTHS, and they couldn't do it. And you're actually sitting there and saying that cleaning products you'd find in your kitchen would be enough to kill of his entire family? Be enough to make more than a spark? 

You're a fucking idiot who needs to get some thicker skin.

God, man, this is why I stay away from Eroge communities. Full of idiots. 

Why you're all gettign wound up about this, I've no idea. It's seriously trashy writing. First of all, why is this dude all lawful good when he's living with people that clearly have ZERO morals? That's my first problem. 
Second of all, why is he shocked the little sister was getting railed by his family? He literally witnessed the big sister get railed. So... Yeah. What? 

Dude should have stayed the fuck away. And fall in love with someone a lot less insipid. 

As for people saying they should kill the family... why? They shagged their siblings, same as the protag wanted to do. No reason to kill them. Kill the protag instead, he's a completely unlikable moron.
Man this was so fucked up. Truly disgusting

@dapsmacks43
"good luck getting what you need for an aloha snackbar" - Get up right now and go to your kitchen or bathroom sink. Look at your cleaning products. Now start looking at the labels and see the listed ingredients. Now know that all it requires to turn those mundane cleaning products into usable components is a modest understanding of chemistry which - thanks to the wonders of the internet, books and fucking primary education - you should already have. Does the law of conservation of mass ring a bell? It should. "odds are rhese fuckers have seen assassination attempts from their own before" - Un-fucking-likely anyone there has, no. In the past? Sure. There might have been falling out and someone tried something. But the most I see is... 3 generations including the latest one? So, no. "They gonna be warry of that shit" - No they fucking are. They're going to be worried about the KID THAT LEFT doing something like going to the cops or whatnot. Not him killing them.

Back when he leaved the house, I dont think the protagonist is mature enough to know how to deal with this situation yet and three years later it still be the case. I think to slaughter them all would be a good choice but I also think that to bail the fuck out and forget everythings is also good, cus genetic degeneration caused by inner breed would wither them all eventually
I'm not bothered by NTR because usually the protagonist is retarded, and in this case, he kinda is too. But this is also kind of screwed up even for me.
i will burn until nothing left burn killed all of the seems to nice better burn let al them suffer first if i become him
"his" konatsu was already dead, i would have killed her.

@dapsmacks43
"it wouldn't have been better if he slaughtered them all" - Actually, yeah, it would have. Basically a cult of child rapists? Yeah, them dying (preferably slow and painful) deaths is basically doing the planet and the entire species a community service. "mainly since they outnumber him" - Aloha Snackbar works fine, too. At that point, he's already gone mentally and likely is going to end up dying from leaving again anyways (crazy cults in the middle of no where doing fucked up shit for multiple generations tend to make sure dissenters in the family, oh I don't know, mysteriously disappear before they can spill the beans/leave). Blaze of glory and going for taking down the cult and relieving your sister of an existence of hell is actually not that bad as far as Bolivian Army-style endings go. Better ending than breaking in and joining the family business, that's for damn sure.
What's everyone so pissed off about. There are many, many more fucked up mangas on this site.

Protagonist is a fucking idiot. So protag (seemingly) falls in love with his big sister and watches her fuck their dad, and it destroys what semblance of family he had left. so he leaves.... And he leaves the little sister he also came to love, not thinking the dad or even anyone in the fucking family wasn't going to make a move on her? The fucking hell? It makes no sense. If he actually wanted to keep her "safe" he would have taken her the moment he left the first time. So really I can't even bring myself to feel bad for the protagonist.
